channel.title: Npc hits
channel.description:
How do i make it so the npc's will actually hit. For example some of my monsters like iron dragons will only hit zeros even if you don't have an anti dragon shield or whatever that shield is called. How would I make it so they can hit and I can control how hit they hit.
Source/Base - Delta Client - Ii Claw iI Delta Client
